Description.Text: Hotel Galatea is a friendly 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Rome. It boasts free Wi-Fi and a great location close to the Teatro dell'Opera di Roma. The area surrounding the impressive Trevi Fountain features narrow cobblestone streets and a high concentration of hotels, cafes and restaurants. Nearby places of interest include the Pantheon, the elegant Spanish Steps, the prestigious Via Veneto, the Roman Forum and Quirinal Hill. Repubblica Teatro dell'Opera metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Rome destinations. The hotel occupies a beautiful former palace, its elegant facade featuring prominent stonework, shuttered windows, wrought iron faux balconies and a grand, arched entrance. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Standard rooms are decorated in a bright, modern style with warm colours and light wood furniture. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV, a mini-bar, work desk and safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
